positions.subtitle: Schaeffler
positions.description: •	Management of Localization, Relocation and Capacity Expansion Projects from Vendor Development, Facility and Technology Transfer, Training of  Personnel to fulfilling Customer Requirements. •	Quantification of Risk associated in project, ways to mitigate them and suggest action plan to Top Management in case of delays and risks.•	Preparation of Aggressive Project Plan based on Customer Milestones and Ensure Gateways Deadlines are met, ensuring adherence to Schedule, Budget and Functional targets. Implement initiatives by identifying and resolving project queries•	Coordination with different departments and  sub-project managers (CFT) through regular meetings, reportings and take or recommend corrective actions as necessary to meet project  projects deliverables to the time, cost and quality requirements
positions.title: Program Manager
positions.description_html:
• Management of Localization, Relocation and Capacity Expansion Projects from Vendor Development, Facility and Technology Transfer, Training of Personnel to fulfilling Customer Requirements.
• Quantification of Risk associated in project, ways to mitigate them and suggest action plan to Top Management in case of delays and risks.
• Preparation of Aggressive Project Plan based on Customer Milestones and Ensure Gateways Deadlines are met, ensuring adherence to Schedule, Budget and Functional targets. Implement initiatives by identifying and resolving project queries
• Coordination with different departments and sub-project managers (CFT) through regular meetings, reportings and take or recommend corrective actions as necessary to meet project projects deliverables to the time, cost and quality requirements

Profitability Analysis

experience.title: Data Scientist

experience.title: Internship : Inventory Control

projects: [{"title":"Analysis of Hedge Funds Performance","start_date":"May 2012","end_date":"Present","description":"•Modelled risk-return characteristics of hedge funds using internal features, market related factors and liquidity•Used Vector Autoregressive modelling for returns data of 9 hedge fund strategies and 3 hedge fund indices•Identified managers market timing skills, style analysis for asset selection and tactical allocation and behaviour in response to liquidity shocks"},{},{"title":"Simulation of Auction markets Simulation Of Auction Markets","start_date":"Jul 2012","end_date":"Dec 2012","description":"•Developed Simulation of Auction Markets as part of the “Virtual Laboratory for Simulation and Gaming Project”, funded by MHRD, Government of India using Visual Studio•Modelled winner’s curse as well as effects of base price, minimum increment and the number of bidders on Auction Process"},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Modelling the effect of Store Inventory on Demand","start_date":"Jul 2011","end_date":"Apr 2012","description":"•Developed an optimal ordering policy for stores where demand is dependent on inventory at store and display management•The objective was maximizing profits for retailers and suppliers in non-coordinated and coordinated supply chain and calculating the difference between them."},{},{"title":"Customers Rating by Banks Using PD bucket","start_date":"Jul 2010","end_date":"Dec 2010","description":"•Developed Customer Rating Systems used by banks using Neural Networks on a pool of 10,000 customers•Pooled customers in different probability default buckets using Fisher Linear discriminant analysis•Determined lending rates for customers based on expected loss varying with exposure, Loss given Default and default probabilities"},{}]
